altername_name: Blend x Brand: Odekake Gousei RPG
name: Blend X Brand
overview: Blend X Brand is a classic RPG game (with some parts of constructing and adventure) in which the player takes the roke of Amy, an inventor in a little town that starts his adventure in her workshop when one of the town people arrives and told her to go to the city since he got a job for her there. When she arrives there (with her pet and his friend) he told here that she will need other two items to build the item that he needs. The game needs a pocketstation the be played since the dungeons are played there.
